snippet: SMITH --Howard. We note with deep sadness the passing of our former board president, Howard Smith, a gentleman, public servant and lifelong library supporter. Brooklyn Public Library Board of Trustees and staff 1/3
lead_paragraph: SMITH --Howard. We note with deep sadness the passing of our former board president, Howard Smith, a gentleman, public servant and lifelong library supporter. Brooklyn Public Library Board of Trustees and staff 1/3
